title: Hilton Garden Inn Columbia SC Northeast Offers Affordable Lodging for South Carolina vs. Kentucky Football Game
text:
Hilton Garden Inn Columbia Northeast offers affordable lodging for the South Carolina and Kentucky football game on September 12, 2015.
 COLUMBIA, SC, September 01, The Hilton Garden Inn Northeast in Columbia, South Carolina offers affordable lodging for fans attending the South Carolina and Kentucky football game on September 12. The Gamecocks will take on SEC rival Kentucky Wildcats in their home opener at Williams-Brice Stadium. Kickoff time is 7:30pm. Game day shuttles will run from Colonial Life Arena to the main gate of the State Fairgrounds.
"We are happy to welcome football fans for the South Carolina and Kentucky game," notes Amber Cobia, Director of Sales at the Hilton Garden Inn Columbia Northeast. "Our guests will enjoy comfortable and affordable accommodations just a few minutes' drive from the stadium and downtown Columbia," explains Ms. Cobia.
A leading choice among Columbia SC hotel , the Hilton Garden Inn Columbia Northeast is a contemporary property with 110 non-smoking guest rooms. Suites are available. Travelers will appreciate the convenience of an in-room microwave, refrigerator, free high speed Internet, and Garden Sleep System adjustable beds. The hotel's Garden Grille and Bar serves breakfast, dinner, and evening room service. The heated indoor pool is the perfect place to relax and unwind after a busy day. Other property amenities include a business center, fitness center, and Pavilion Pantry Market. This Columbia South Carolina hotel received the 2015 Hotel Success Award, the highest honor for the Hilton Garden Inn brand.
The Hilton Garden Inn Columbia Northeast is located off I-77 at Exit 19 (Farrow Road). Current hotel specials include the Bed N' Breakfast Deal, with cooked to order breakfast for four. AAA, senior, and military discounts are available. Hilton Honors members will earn points toward free hotel nights.
For additional game day information and tickets, visit www.gamecocksonline.com . To book your stay at the Hilton Garden Inn Columbia Northeast, call 803-807-9000 or visit online at www.ColumbiaSouthCarolinaHotel.com .
About Hilton Garden Inn Columbia SC Hotel (Northeast)
The recently opened Hilton Garden Inn Columbia/Northeast hotel is located just off I-77 at exit 19, near the Northeast business district and is conveniently situated just 11 miles from downtown Columbia. This Columbia, South Carolina hotel was built with features and amenities to ensure you'll truly have a great stay with us including complimentary Wi-Fi, 24-hour business center, meeting space, heated indoor pool with hot tub, and The Garden Grill and Bar restaurant. Guests can enjoy staying at The Hilton Garden Inn Columbia SC hotel, where everything is right where you need it.
For more information visit: http://www.ColumbiaSouthCarolinaHotel
